$WmMPID_ヘルビンディ,ch00_12_Helbindi_M_Normal,Face_Smile|Hah! So THIS is where you've been
hiding, you filthy rats. Must be my
lucky day!$k$pI know that you were hoping to be
slaughtered by the best, so I crawled
out of the depths of hell, just for you!$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMPID_ヘルビンディ,ch00_12_Helbindi_M_Normal,Face_Pain|To hell with you all! I'm not...going to
die...$k$p
